name: DeprecatedAttributes_toStringTest
description: Unit tests for the toString method of DeprecatedAttributes class.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithAllAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method with all attributes set.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithForRemovalOnly
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method with only the forRemoval attribute set.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithSinceOnly
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method with only the since attribute set.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithDescriptionOnly
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method with only the description attribute set.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithNoAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method with no attributes set.
